title: 有無聽 Techno | Trance | Tech House | Deep House 嘅人, 入嚟交流下?

replies.msg:
我年頭開始聽 Techno. 身邊無乜朋友聽呢啲, 想搵人吹下 Techno-based genre, 或者 DJ-ing.
(in fact, 得一個fd 叫做聽 electronic (dnb), 其他都聽開 Hip-Hop, Indie Rock)

Techno, Tech House: Charlotte de Witte, Amelie Lens, Maceo Plex, testpilot, Hot Since 82, UMEK, A*S*Y*S, T78, Joyhauser, FJAAK, ANNA

Trance: Gareth Emery, Tiësto, Dash Berlin, Motorcycle, Mat Zo, Velvetine, Jaytech, any artist from Anjunabeats

(有聽 Electronic Music 嘅都可以入嚟吹下~)
lm 淨係對berlin  同 electronic music果幾個字起機

之前成日會loop dutch dj
不過聽聽下又會覺得好類同所以悶悶地

quote.msg: lm 淨係對berlin  同 electronic music果幾個字起機

replies.msg:
Berlin Techno? 講真, 我覺得同 Techno (Deep, Melodic, Detroit) 比, 大同小異.

Electronic music 好廣, 你聽開邊飯?

quote.msg:
之前成日會loop dutch dj
不過聽聽下又會覺得好類同所以悶悶地

replies.msg:
係咪 Armin Van Buuren, Ferry Corsten 呢啲?
Armin Van Buuren 最近果幾個 album 都好垃圾
以爲自己聽緊 Electro House / Big Room

Ferry Corsten 就好少少, 經典啲
DJ splash, DJ Zorm, 唔識分咩種類

replies.msg:
Major Lazer 都幾特別下, 個組合都幾surprising
我唔淨係聽佢地啲 edm, 都會聽下佢地produce 嘅 pop track (佢哋同 MØ 都有好多collab)

Skrillex 間唔中聽下啦
以前成日聽, 但係最近佢無乜點出新 electronic 歌 (Sonny 返咗去佢個 heavy metal band "From First to Last" 度)
Mumbai Power 同 Fuji Opening 都係經常會loop
個人嚟講唔太中意佢近呢幾年嘅style, Dubstep 變 Brostep, 差少少變 Riddim... 另外有啲 collab 直情變咗 Trap, House, Bass House, 果啲我唔當 dubstep 聽嘅話都okay嘅
Recess 呢個 album 都係經常會loop, 特別係佢加入返啲 Reggae 嘅vocal 落 dubstep
Jack Ü 都會loop 下
聽開DJ Sasha果類progressive house

quote.msg: 聽開DJ Sasha果類progressive house

replies.msg:
有無啲 progressive house mix 介紹下
我YouTube search 第一個 result 係 beatport Melodic House & Techno mix 嚟...

quote.msg: 聽開DJ Sasha果類progressive house

有無啲 progressive house mix 介紹下
我YouTube search 第一個 result 係 beatport Melodic House & Techno mix 嚟...

replies.msg:
求其YouTube打dj sasha就搵到一堆
https://youtu.be/4zIidh-n6kI

但你唔好期望有得un好激咁跳舞
聽開techno都唔應該咁

仲有基本上我聽techno都係認人唔認歌
個個DJ 都有自己風格，基本上你入場已經知道自己想要乜

新進有兩個比利時女DJ玩Techno又係玩到出哂名
Charlotte de witty
Amelie Lens

Charlotte 比較重acid techno
Amelie就好un d節奏快d

replies.msg:
我以爲你講緊 Progressive House 係 deadmau5, Avicii 果啲
點知都係 Techno ))))

我開始聽 techno 果陣係聽 Charlotte de Witte 同 Amelie Lens 先, 跟住再 branch out 去 UMEK, Joyhauser呢啲

Acid Techno 會聽 No Mana, i_o (mau5trap artist)

最近聽緊呢個
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0mWEMPO_b3c

(聽 EDM 嘅話, 如果無歌詞我唔會記得歌名... 同埋, mix 咗啲咩歌我自己都唔記得 :/ )

最近發現寫code 聽techno 配搭幾好

replies.msg:
係喎無留意自己再舉例又講翻techno dj
無計progressive house基本上Sasha & John Digweed 已經係神級同埋最具代表性。

btw呢篇文章都舉咗其他新d既dj玩progressive house
https://www.google.com/amp/s/amp.kkbox.com/tw/tc/column/features-0-1860-1.html

佢舉果d例子我只會聽Deadmou5 ， 但Deadmou5我覺得都唔係house又係近techno多

千禧年玩house出名既可以搵下Deep dish

replies.msg:
John Digweed 未聽過
佢啲track 都唔差, Progressive House 得嚟有啲 Techno/Tech House 味道. 我得閒聽多啲先
Sasha 啲 Techno mix 都唔差
(最近成日開 Cercle 同 Boiler Room 聽)
---
今年techno 好似多咗注意力
連 Calvin Harris 都produce melodic techno (Love Regenerator)
---
deadmau5 早期 vexillology (2006), for lack of a better name (2009), random album title (2009), 4x4=12 (2010), album title goes here (2012)
呢啲我都會當係 progressive house, 因爲佢係 house beat 嚟

係 while 1<2 開始experimental 少少, 跟住 W:/2016Album 入面首 Imaginary Friends 基本上係半 Techno 半 Prog House. (i_o 整咗個 techno remix)
mau5ville Level 2,3, here's the drop 開始已經係full techno. 你見啲 remix artist 全部都係 techno dj 嚟 (Gallya, No Mana, Pig&Dan, Matt Lange)
Polyphobia 拎 Monophobia 做 blueprint, 但係已經係 techno track 嚟

就咁單獨睇 Strobe, 佢個 buildup 成4分鐘, 普通house music 係無可能做到, 所以先會歸類做 Progressive House

咁講啦, 本身 deadmau5 係有 techno 底, 不過佢個 career 大部分都係做 Prog House, 近呢兩年先用 testpilot 呢個名做 techno dj
---
篇文提到 Zedd 同 David Guetta... 以前會聽, 依家呢兩個artist 太mainstream, 太 electropop, 唔啱聽
Kaskade 嘅話, 篇文提 Eyes 呢首歌. 係好聽但係我會 prefer I Remember 同 Last Chance
